title: Sorkhabad, Hamadan
data: Sorkhabad (Persian: سرخ اباد, also Romanized as Sorkhābād; also known as Surkhābād)[1] is a village in Sangestan Rural District, in the Central District of Hamadan County, Hamadan Province, Iran. At the 2006 census, its population was 1,414, in 350 families.[2] This Hamadan County location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
